titles.title: Hymn 12 - O Lord of Heav'n and Earth and Sea

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
O Lord of Heav'n and earth and sea,
To Thee all praise and glory be;
How shall we show our love to Thee,
Giver of all?

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The golden sunshine, vernal air,
Sweet flow'rs and fruits, Thy love declare;
Where harvests ripen, Thou art there,
Giver of all.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
For peaceful homes and healthful days,
For all the blessings earth displays,
We owe Thee thankfulness and praise,
Giver of all.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Thou didst not spare Thine only Son,
But gav'st Him for a world undone,
And freely, with that blessèd One,
Thou givest all.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Thou giv'st the Spirit's blessèd dow'r,
Spirit of life and love and pow'r,
And dost His sev'nfold graces show'r
Upon us all.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
For souls redeemed, for sins forgiv'n,
For means of grace and hopes of Heav'n,
Father, all praise to Thee be giv'n,
Who givest all.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
We lose what on ourselves we spend,
We have as treasure without end
Whatever, Lord, to Thee we lend,
Who givest all.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Whatever, Lord we lend to Thee,
Repaid a thousandfold will be,
Then

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
To Thee, from Whom we all derive
Our life, our gifts, our power to give:
O may we ever with Thee live,
Who givest all.
